alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 23 at 2:10PM MST until December 24 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches in the lower elevations, with 6 to 12 inches possible in the higher elevations of the northern Laramie Range. Wind gusts up to 45 MPH. * WHERE...North Laramie Range and Lower Elevations of Converse County. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, possibly snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. Holiday travel may be impacted.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
